scripts.start: npm run mkdirs && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-dependencies && npm run copy-dependencies && webpack serve
scripts.benchmark: concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:1337 && node run-benchmark.js --romDir $ROM_DIR" --success first --kill-others
scripts.build: npm run mkdirs && npx webpack --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-dependencies
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
